title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: Your Words Of Wisdom Corrected My Thinking
description:
Moana, molested by her mother’s fourth husband, believes she's the "bad person" ... - Dr. Laura: "A Light Bulb Went Off!"

What moments of clarity have you had? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life
